I cannot copy and replace the cbi.dll file. It keeps saying I need permission. 

A little help please.

@Tiberiusduck

You need elevated permissions to do it. Obviously you don't have that. Follow the steps below:

1. Open Command Prompts as Administrator and type the following EXACTLY:

net user administrator /active:yes

2. Now hit ENTER/RETURN
3. Now type:

exit

4. Re-boot your PC and log into the newly created Administrator account and do the install from that account.

5. When finished with the install, open Command Prompt again as Administrator and type the following command EXACTLY:

net user administrator /active:no

6. Now hit ENTER/RETURN
7. Now type:

exit

8. Re-boot and log into your account as normal.

JOB DONE!!!

No offense to the uploader but this anti-virus is the worst anti-virus ever. I have 16 gigs of ram on my computer and Kaspersky is using nearly all of it during scans. All other functions and software on my computer are completely useless till scans are complete. A side note is also that there has been a tremendous overall drop in my computers speed even when Kaspersky isn't scanning. If anyone thinks that  I'm the only one having this problem then check out the comments on Softpedia. An endless stream of consistent negative comments about this memory hog software.  Sorry "2010Kaiser" but this was indeed my nightmare experience with this product.

For the ones that are having problems: just follow exactly the instructions on the description, I'll try to make it easier:

1- Copy the contents of the No1 file to C:Program Files (x86) //or the one without the (x86) if you have a 32 bits OS.
It should then be a file like this:
C:Program Files (x86)Kaspersky LabKaspersky Anti-Virus 2013  **and inside it should be the cbi.dll.

2- Copy the contents of the No2 file to C:ProgramData  // if you can't find it, just type C:ProgramData in the bar like you do with websites.
Then it should be a file like this:
C:ProgramDataKaspersky LabAVP13Data *** and inside it should be the _1AA7CD13.key file

3- Just intall it normally and run it, it won't ask for any key. When you run it you'll see that you have a 365 days license.

If you have problems after this try to completely unnistall and try again, try running as ADM and disconnect from the internet. If it still don't work either your PC is incompatible (IDK, OS or another antivirus?) or you are a moron that can't follow 3 steps.

Again, thanks for the torrent Kaiser.
